Package jam.io.hdf

Pure Java implementation to store histograms, gates, and scalers in the HDF 4.1 format.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
HDFconstants Contains constants for the jam.io.hdf package.
JamHDFFields Contains field names used in HDF files produced by the jam.io.hdf package.
 

Class Summary
DataIDAnnotation Class to represent an HDF Data identifier annotation data object.
DataIDLabel Class to represent an HDF Data identifier label data object.
DataObject Abstract class to represent a generic HDF data object.
FileDescription Class to represent an HDF File Description data object.
FileIdentifier Class to represent an HDF File Identifier data object.
HDFile Class which represents the HDF file on disk.
HDFileFilter Filters only HDF files for file dialogs.
HDFIO Reads and writes HDF files containing spectra, scalers, gates, and additional useful information.
JavaMachineType Specifies the format of numbers and chars used by Java.
LibVersion Class to represent a 32-bit java int HDF Library Version Number data object for 4.1r2.
NumberType Class to represent a 32-bit java int HDF NumberType data object.
NumericalDataGroup Class to represent an HDF Numerical Data Group data object.
ScientificData Class to represent an HDF Scientific Data data object.
ScientificDataDimension Class to represent an HDF Scientific Data Dimension data object.
ScientificDataLabel Class to represent an HDF scientific data label data object.
ScientificDataScales Class to represent an HDF Scientific Data Dimension data object.
Vdata Class to represent an HDF Vdata description data object.
VdataDescription Class to represent an HDF Vdata description data object.
VirtualGroup Class to represent an HDF Virtual Group data object.
 

Exception Summary
HDFException Exception that can be thrown by classes in io.hdf package
 

Package jam.io.hdf Description

Pure Java implementation to store histograms, gates, and scalers in the HDF 4.1 format.
